listing_company_name: LJ Hooker Property Partners - Sunnybank Hills and Mount Gravatt
description:
You don't need to purchase a home to experience daily luxuries - this stylish townhome is proof of that. Situated in a fabulously central Calamvale locale, metres from childcare and parklands, and within walking distance of buses and schools, it presents leisurely living at a fraction of the cost and maintenance of a standard home. With a rippling onsite pool in the complex and a large, easy-care courtyard with stunning canopy vistas atop its Colorbond fencing, it is a slice of peaceful paradise smack bang in the middle of convenient suburbia.

A quick overview of its most outstanding features:

- Spacious and glistening layout with shining tiles and sparkling downlights throughout the air-conditioned open plan lounge and dining area
- Radiant kitchen including luminous stone benchtops, plenty of white cabinetry, tinted glass splashbacks, quality electric appliances and dishwasher
- Large private courtyard with Colorbond fencing and bushland canopy vistas
- Three carpeted bedrooms with fans and built-in robes, master also including air conditioning and stylish ensuite
- Trendy complex with onsite pool located in central Calamvale position - walk to childcare, parklands, buses, and schools

Its rendered facade is ultra-sleek and trendy with a modern grey-scale colour palette accentuated by a mahogany-toned single garage and a rich timber front door. The spacious layout within is glisteningly contemporary with sparkling downlights, shining tiles and an air conditioner combining to create a comfortably chic setting for lounging or dining.

Around the corner sits a radiant kitchen with cosy dining bar, luminous stone benchtops, plenty of white cabinetry, tinted glass splashbacks and quality electric appliances including a dishwasher. It is perfectly fitted for effortless cooking, baking, or catering so you can reach your full hosting potential.

A wide slider spills out onto the large, fenced courtyard which has been neatly landscaped with low maintenance shrubs and offers ample space for intimate entertaining or relaxing. From above the dark Colorbond fencing you get to catch a glimpse of the bushland beyond with towering trees making this space feel miles away.

Back inside you can ascend the carpeted stairs where you'll find three carpeted bedroom that are generously proportioned, and all fitted with ceiling fans and built-in robes. The master suite is further embellished with an air conditioner and a gleaming ensuite with all modern amenities.

A shared bathroom with both a shower and bathtub is also available and similarly elegantly finished for the utmost comfort of both occupants and guests.

In a serene Calamvale nook that's still close to everything a couple or family needs, this is a winning investment or easy-care home.

- 550 m to Goodstart Early Learning Algester
- 550 m to Calamvale District Park
- 1 km to bus stop
- 1.6 km to Algester State School
- 1.8 km to Calamvale Community College
- 2 km to Algester Asia Mart
- 2.9 km to Calamvale Shopping Centre
- 3.8 km to Sunnybank Hills Shoppingtown
- 3.9 km to Calamvale Central

Flawlessly modern and capable of fulfilling your every desire, this stylish townhouse will sell quickly. Contact Karl Gillespie or Steven Li today before it's too late.

We are committed to the health and safety of our customers and staff, and their families. When entering a premises please adhere to all social distancing (2m2 apart for spaces less that 200m2 and 4m2 apart for spaces more than 200m2) and strict hygiene requirements. Please also ensure that you follow social distancing measures and keep 1.5m away from each other.

All information contained herein is gathered from sources we consider to be reliable. However we can not guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided and interested parties must solely rely on their own enquiries.
